about_the_game:
Set in 1930s Southern Europe, where technology has eclipsed magic, an estranged group of Moon Worshippers known as the Anaxagori resurfaces with an ominous prophecy: an eternal lunar eclipse. Dismissed by the public as antiquated mystics, the Anaxagori's warnings contrast sharply with the populace's enthusiasm for what is hailed as a historic celestial event. Fresh from an archaeological expedition, Helena Nightshade only learns of the eclipse's significance upon arriving in Istanbul.



Initially drawn by the thrill of adventure, Helena soon discovers that fate has a hand in her involvement.



In this point-and-click hidden object adventure game, you will guide Helena as she pieces together clues in her journal, discovers hidden objects throughout her journey, and solves a variety of puzzles and minigames!

Features

  • Follow the story of Helena Nightshade
  • Solve the mystery of the Eternal Lunar Eclipse
  • Travel to 1920s Southern Europe
  • 35 chapters with 1-3 sub scenes
  • 29 subgames relating to the story
  • 6 special chapters
  • 6 Wallpapers

Explore richly detailed scenes, interact with intriguing characters, become friends with a certain avian, and aid the right forces to prevent the cataclysmic tragedy!
